result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devan James Chidester

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on February 22, 2023 at 01:30 pm.

03:01 PM  Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Taylor E Klokow appeared by video for Devan James Chidester.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court, jury trial to be set.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report

3:20 PM/3:25PM  Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Devan James Chidester.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Parties address court regarding bond, Court denies motion to modify bond. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.
Arraignment scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Activity: Adjourned initial appearance 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:40 PM Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Devan James Chidester.  Prosecuting attorney Richard Jay Sullivan appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Bond to continue.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 03:56 PM Defendant Devan James Chidester appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Colin T Nicholson appeared by video for Devan James Chidester.  Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to defendant, address verified, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set $500.00 No contact directly or indirectly with J.C., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Adjourned initial appearance October 6, 2022 at 3:00 pm.
